Buy down the price of NFTs you want using NFTs you have.

To get started follow these steps:

Step 1: Connect Your Wallet
Link your wallet through NeoSwap.

Step 2: Browse and Select
Find your desired NFT. Make sure the link has the NFT ID.

Step 3: AI Trade Proposals
Our AI suggests ways to lower the cost of your chosen NFT.

Step 4: Choose and Sign
Pick a trade and sign it to get the NFT.

Step 5: Share Feedback
Declined a trade? Your feedback improves future suggestions.

Experience the smarter way to buy NFTs with Buy Down. Start enhancing your collection today.
